bibl.title: Ray Raymond v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Spokane}ss

Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. Ray Raymond Defendant} In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, in and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
TO THE SHERIFF OF Spokane COUNTY, GREETING:
IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon Charles Wilson, Frankie Sutsinger J.B. Barnes no within WTy Dr. G.S. Allison

to be and appear before the District Court, at the Court House, in Spokane Falls, in said County, on the 23rd day of May A.D. 1887 at 11 o'clock A.M. to here give evidence in the above entitled cause on part of said Defendant there to remain until discharged.
WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of this 23 day of May A.D. 1887
D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy

figure.p: DISTRICT COURT WASHINGTON TERRITORY SPOKANE COUNTY FOURTH JUD DISTRICT

p.unclear:
Karson W.R. Lundson
Whittier Harner
A Emmer Bellinge
Donaldson Thayer
W.A. Sutsinger Brookman
Donahue Burm

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane} ss
I hereby certify that I served the within subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to them in said County, on this 23rd day of May A.D. 1887.
James Glipsen Sheriff
By by A.J. Duncan Deputy
I further certify that after meaning delegated search and due inquiry I was unable to find the within name witnesses J.R. Barnes and Chas Wilson
Case No. 1886
SUBPOENA
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District Thereof holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
Territory Plaintiff
Vs.
Ray Raymond Defendant
Returned and filed this 24 day of May A.D. 1887
D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy

SHERIFF'S FEES
Serving 2 names at .40 .80
Mileage 4 miles at .10 .40
Total, - - - - - $ 1.20
